entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: VPCLMULQDQ Intrinsics #95772
  • QuicListener.IsSupported behavior is flaky on DebianArm64 #95771
  • crossgen2 failure in VMR when using VMR stage 2 build scenario #95768
  • SuperPMI: add JIT memory diff measurements in per-PR pipeline runs #95767
    Future
  • Local running of libraries tests is broken #95762
    9.0.0
  • .NET RPM packages are failing FIPS verification #95759
  • [PGO] assert "Mismatch in align instruction." #95755
    9.0.0
  • RemoveAllKeyed Requires Equality Operator #95754
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] Windows stress builds are broken #95750
    9.0.0
  • JIT: missing opportunities in constant folding around bitwise ops #95747
    Future
  • Wrong disposal of FileConfigurationSource.FileProvider by FileConfigurationProvider.Dispose() on a modification of ConfigurationManager.Sources #95745
  • Documentation error for System.IO.Directory.GetFiles(string path, string searchPattern, EnumerationOptions enumerationOptions) #95730
    Future
  • .NET 8 macOS *.app does not launch after code signing #95727
  • UseManagedNtlm in NET8 cannot authenticate NTLM on IIS with Extended Protection Accept & Required #95725
    9.0.0
  • DriveInfo.GetDrives() - Debian 12 #95720
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_13910/GitHub_13910/GitHub_13910.cmd #95713

Closed

  • SerialPort is not supported on Android ? #86619
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] [outerloop] jit-format: Format job found errors, please apply the format patch #95159
  • JIT: Unroll GT_BLK via two regs instead of one #93249
    Future
  • AccessViolation when reading last byte from pointer to BitmapData #84287
    9.0.0
  • Serial Port support on Android #58740
    Future
  • Generic type check allocates for nullable structs #95685
    9.0.0
  • System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException: Ambiguous match found. #95736
  • FrozenDictionary case insensitive comparer not working correctly #95732
  • Guard against invalid TypeToConvert args to read methods of object and collection converter #36605
    Future
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET 6.0 January servicing SDK installed, the WindowsDesktop runtime should be display as "6.0.26" not "6.0.25". #95566
  • Widespread "Optimizing assemblies for size is not supported for the selected publish configuration" failures #95712
  • System.Reflection.Metadata Dependency question #95626
    Future
  • [net8.0-ios] App crashes on ios device when calling static abstract generic interface method in a sealed class #94467
    9.0.0
  • upgrade to .net 8.0 error CS8347, How to solve it? please. #95686
  • CA2017 reports Logging has wrong number of arguments #95584
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Add explicit successor for BBJ_COND false branch #95773
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] [Android] Bump target SDK version for Android sample #95770
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Move a lock to protect m_pDynamicStaticsInfo #95769
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update area-Tracing-coreclr and area-UWP owners #95766
    area-Meta
  • Optimize a castclass over nullables #95764
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move `StartupHooks` tests and remaining uses of PortableApp project to pre-built test assets #95761
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Replaced string concatenation by StringBuilder usage #95760
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Enable Windows runs of AddressSanitizer #95758
    area-Infrastructure
  • [tests] Use shorter path for temp directory on Apple mobile platforms #95757
    os-ios, area-System.Formats.Tar, 9.0.0
  • Disable Mono interpreter runs for capacity issues #95756
    needs-area-label
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Use Program.dll instead of Program.exe in illink docs #95752
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Add flowgraph dumping for new loops #95748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update IHostApplicationBuilder.cs #95746
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Small tweak for branch optimizer #95740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove most loop-related hoisting quirks #95734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated #95733
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Remove loop-related VN quirks #95729
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Clean up the thread local memory regardless of managed thread's presence #95722
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add CFG build for EventPipe enabled #95721
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use python venv for SPMI collection on linux #95714
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add Android support to System.IO.Ports #95749
    area-System.IO.Ports
  • Move many interop tests to run in-proc and move many to built in the merged runner itself #94109
    test-enhancement, area-Interop-coreclr
  • JIT: refactor CSE heuristics #95705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix optRedirectBlock for "fallthrough" BBJ_ALWAYS #95724
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Switch morph DFS to use general DFS #95726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update version of Microsoft.Diagnostics.Tracing.TraceEvent package #95680
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Migrate to the 'locker' GitHub action for locking closed/stale issues/PRs #95432
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_EQ_3A to IF_SVE_HR_3A #95679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Temporarily disable "extra" CoreCLR perf runs on arm64 #95728
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix comment typo in array.cpp #95709
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Remove arm/x86 conditions from mono.proj #95739
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Make isRemovableJmpCandidate less restrictive on AMD64 #95493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix function prototype warning in debugger-engine.c #95735
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Update terminology in loop cloning, and simplify a bit #95648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove boxing from "value is S" for nullables #95711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix typos in NonGC-heap.md #95731
    area-Meta
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Port VN and loop hoisting to new loop representation #95589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] LoongArch code sync #95673
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Run native AOT legs on illink changes #95719
    needs-area-label
  • Build tests as self-contained for native AOT #95718
    needs-area-label
  • [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call for static calls and handle nullable value types #94787
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Clean up the thread local memory regardless of managed thread's presence #95715
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [JIT] Add BasicBlock::bbFlags helper methods #95139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Make sure LOHThreshold less than region_size #95485
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] Stop falling back to interpreter for runtime invoke #95469
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (4/N) #95670
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Added `SVE_GD_2A` ARM64 encoding #95618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add Arm N2 SVE perfscore file #95700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Use full TLS record size for application data on Windows #95595
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Per CMake docs, mark all RC-only DLLs and C++/CLI DLLs that do not export unmanaged symbols as `MODULE` libraries. #95532
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make ValueTuple members that can be made readonly readonly #90773
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add post-phase validation of DFS tree #95682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95582
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Consolidate wasi/wasm build bits #95535
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser][mt] dynamic thread create #95702
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Added SVE_GK_2A and SVE_GL_1A arm64 encodings #95707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Added an optional HybridGlobalization run of libraries #95324
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • [release/8.0-staging] ILLink: Allow interface methods to not have newslot #95571
    Servicing-consider, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.x
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Reduce use of madvise DODUMP/DONTDUMP #95643
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Build fixes for Bionic on x64 #95382
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix ILLink/ILC hang when tracking too many hoisted local values #95302
    Servicing-consider, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NO-MERGE][WIP] Testing Swift interop CI lines #95699
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on SslStream #92684
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Reenable disabled nativeaot warnings and fix the issues #95698
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net
  • [LoongArch64] add LoongArch64's SIMD128/256 instructions within emitter. #95456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • React to new Package Validation change #94432
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Provide System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow package readme #94582
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Console.Unix: fix ANSI colors over redirected standard output. #95654
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Generate interface lists for necessary EETypes #95683
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove dependency on AppDomain from a hello world app #95710
    needs-area-label
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
